section_title: REPORT OF THE GEF TO THE COP
sentences: The COW then considered the report of the GEF to the COP (FCCC/CP/1995/4).
Mr. Tahar Hadj-Sadok of the Interim Secretariat introduced the document.

He noted that the report was divided into two sections, the development of an operational strategy and the initial activities undertaken by the GEF, including enabling activities for national communications and project activities.
The first section describes a two track approach.
COP-1 may adopt a strategy of maximizing short-term cost effectiveness, long term cost effectiveness, or a mixed strategy of short and long-term priorities.
The second section describes the initial activities undertaken by the GEF on climate change. The Chair noted that COP-1 had to decide between the various approaches described.
He suggested that the GEF should take fully into account the modalities for the functioning of the financial mechanism.
He said he would hold consultations on these matters.
